text.text_translated:
Society tells us this. Nature does not tell us this.
Society says girls should do arts and humanities. Society says boys should do maths and physics.
Also, young people do not see many good female role models in science jobs. A role model is a person who shows a good example.
Cartoons and stories often show men as scientists. A scientist is a person who studies science. These men are crazy. Or they are clever people who make things. Or they are people who travel in space. These are always men.
People also have wrong ideas about scientists. These ideas are not good.
People think scientists are geeky. They think scientists are not good at talking to other people. They think scientists work alone. They think scientists are not part of the world around them.
Media shows these false ideas. This can mean girls do not feel like scientists. They do not want science as a job. It does not look good to them.
If girls saw more good female role models in science, they would have more confidence. They would feel more like they belong in these subjects.
